headline: Southern California Edison Provides Rebuilding Plan for Electric Distribution in Altadena and Malibu
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., April 11, 2025--Southern California Edison today provided an initial comprehensive plan to rebuild the impacted electrical distribution infrastructure in the Altadena and Malibu areas affected by the January wildfires. The plan focuses on increasing reliability and long-term resilience, including the undergrounding of new distribution equipment. SCE’s preliminary plan would underground 153 circuit miles: 130 circuit miles, which includes nearly all distribution power lines in H
